latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Reinspection Not Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Camp Operator fails to developed and implemented Written Safety Plan Plan not reviewd and updated annually Plan not approved by DOHMH does not comply with health code and 7-25 of State Sanitary Code
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Record of child medical exam within one year of admision not on file Record incomplete fails to contain medical history recommendations for special conditions current immunization contact information for each child
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Adequately stocked first aid cabinet not provided and maintained first aid kit not provided for traveling camp
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Walls and ceiling in comercial building not properly constructed not maintained in good repair unclean
Camp operator fails to maintains staff records application qualifications certifications not on file or available for inspection employees education experience training and references not verified
All camp staff have not had recent medical exam including TB testing as required by the Dept
Parental authorization for camp to respond to emergencies as appropriate in absence of parental contact not on file
Traveling camps and Municipal camps fail to obtain written parental permission prior to transporting campers to off site facilities
